headline: Australia Pinning Its Title Hopes on Barty
abstract: Ashleigh Barty is two wins away from winning a Grand Slam title in her home country, as the top-ranked player left in a draw without Serena Williams, Naomi Osaka and other big names.
lead_paragraph: MELBOURNE, Australia â€” In downtown Melbourne, Ashleigh Barty is nearly impossible to avoid. Her image adorns posters not just for tennis apparel but also for things like sunblock, watches and even Vegemite, the savory spread that is an Australian classic.
